result.execSummary:
The defendant Juan R Maldonado was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: BOND APPLIED - costs pd in full.
TO COMMENCE FORTHWITH.  Huber and work crew are authorized.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Juan R Maldonado

Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Terry Rose.  Clerk: PT
Victim is present in court and statement is given.  Sentencing arguments made.    Defendant is sentenced to 9 months in the KCJ forthwith.  Credit for 110 days.  Huber & Work Crew is authorized.    Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.  Court costs also ordered.  Cash Bond on deposit is to be applied to costs and surcharge and any remaining balance of bond is to be applied to 16CF254.  Appeal Rights given.
Amended

Attorney Margaret Drees appeared for the State. Defendant, Juan R Maldonado, appeared with Attorney Terry William Rose.  Clerk: PT
Amended Information filed by the State and case is resolved.  DE pleads Guilty; found guilty by the court.  PSI ordered.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 27, 2016 at 10:30 am.
